default.name: Manage Connections
default.msg: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder connection management. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder workflow module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.

state.name: Community Builder Manage Connections
state.description: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder connection management. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder workflow module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.
